channel.title: NPC's noclip to attack you?
channel.description: In this server there's a boss that spawns npc's to attack with him when he gets to a certain Hp. The weird thing is, if you teleport away w/o killing them all. They noclip through everything in their path to get to you, then start to kill you. Does anyone know how I can fix this glitch? Like maybe after you exit certain coordinates they stop attacking? Thanks.

item.title: NPC's noclip to attack you?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Because you aren’t reseting the attack of both the player & npc when the player is teleporting.

Also, removed spam.

Read full topic
